articles.title: Valve’s Steam Deck OLED will be ‘intermittently’ out of stock because of the RAM crisis
articles.description: Valve has updated the Steam Deck website to say that the Steam Deck OLED may be out of stock "intermittently in some regions due to memory and storage shortages." The PC gaming handheld has been out of stock in the US and other parts of the world for a few days, and thanks to this […]
articles.author: Jay Peters
